Content:: The Gutleutviertel is a quarter of Frankfurt am Main, Germany. It is part of the Ortsbezirk Innenstadt I. The name Gutleut originates from the "Gutleuthof", once a refuge for lepers hosted by the "fraternity of the good people". The former working class district has spruced up considerably in recent years with the development of a new housing and business district at the former West Harbor.  This Hesse location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
